net.kuujo.vertigo.cluster.data

Interface AsyncList<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The list data type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncCollection<T>

    public interface AsyncList<T>
extends AsyncCollection<T>
    Asynchronous list.

    If the current Vert.x instance is a Hazelcast clustered instance, the list will be backed by a Hazelcast list. Otherwise, the list will be backed by a Vert.x shared data map.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

        Gets a value at a specific index in the list.

        index - The index of the value to get.
        resultHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called with the value result.

        Sets an index in the list.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to set.
        value - The value to set.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete.

      • remove

        void remove(int index)
        Removes an index in the list.
        Parameters:

      • remove

        void remove(int index,
          org.vertx.java.core.Handler<org.vertx.java.core.AsyncResult<T>> doneHandler)
        Removes an index in the list.
        Parameters:
        index - The index to remove.
        doneHandler - An asynchronous handler to be called once complete. The handler result will be the value that was removed from the list.
